A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While the movie does have its faults (unnecessary sub-plots\, long runtime\, cringeworthy jokes bordering on parody)\, it expands the universe\, has some really fantastic character interactions (specifically between Rey\, Kylo\, and Luke)\, and raises interesting questions for long-time fans while doing justice to and developing returning characters\, both from the new and original trilogies. I think it delivered on the hype in a way The Force Awakens never did. Rían Johnson didn’t play it safe and successfully took the Star Wars universe into uncharted territory. The Last Jedi will be a hard act to follow.
